bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Static Var Compensator Field Tests
IEEE Guide for Static Var Compensator Field Tests

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General guidelines and criteria for the field testing of static var compensators (SVCs) before they are placed in-service, for the purpose of verifying their specified performance are described. The major elements of a commissioning program are identified so that the user can formulate a specific plan that is most suited for his or her own SVC.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
